bar_drinks.name: Cucumber Sunrise
bar_drinks.description: A refreshing blend of cucumber, lime, and vodka with a splash of cranberry
bar_drinks.ingredients: Vodka, cucumber, lime juice, simple syrup, cranberry juice

bar_drinks.name: The Perfect Storm
bar_drinks.description: A bold mix of dark rum, ginger beer, and lime
bar_drinks.ingredients: Dark rum, ginger beer, lime juice, angostura bitters

bar_drinks.name: Spicy Chipotle Pineapple Martini
bar_drinks.description: Sweet and spicy combination with a smoky finish
bar_drinks.ingredients: Vodka, pineapple juice, chipotle syrup, lime juice

bar_drinks.name: Rum Runner
bar_drinks.description: Classic tropical cocktail with multiple rums and fruit juices
bar_drinks.ingredients: Light rum, dark rum, banana liqueur, blackberry liqueur, orange juice, pineapple juice, grenadine

bar_drinks.name: Blue's Patron Margarita
bar_drinks.description: Premium frozen margarita made with top-shelf tequila
bar_drinks.ingredients: Patron Silver tequila, blue curacao, lime juice, agave nectar

bar_drinks.name: Lime & Coconut Signature
bar_drinks.ingredients: Lime juice, coconut syrup, guava syrup, coconut milk, Malibu coconut rum

bar_drinks.name: Lavender Daiquiri
bar_drinks.description: A floral twist on the classic daiquiri
bar_drinks.ingredients: White rum, lavender syrup, lime juice, simple syrup

bar_drinks.name: Pineapple Coconut Mojito
bar_drinks.description: Tropical variation of the classic mojito
bar_drinks.ingredients: White rum, pineapple, coconut cream, mint leaves, lime, soda water

bar_drinks.name: Nordic Chill
bar_drinks.description: Signature vodka cocktail served in a glass made of ice
bar_drinks.ingredients: Skyy vodka, peach schnapps, blue curacao, pineapple juice

bar_drinks.name: Irish Coffee
bar_drinks.description: Classic hot cocktail perfect for sea days
bar_drinks.ingredients: Irish whiskey, coffee, brown sugar, whipped cream
